com.risk.team.model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.team.model.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Card
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Card class which represents the card model of the Risk game. It provides methods for performing operations on the cards like exchange cards for armies etc.
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    yashgolwala
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
